text:
Her physical form is simply too massive to look up at.
—'Therefore', she has a secret dream that could never be fulfilled.

Baphomet.
A school counselor who cares for the mental well-being of the students.

The name of this well-known black goat
was once worshipped as a heretical demon.

'Heresy', the very act of deviating from the rules and 'Faith'
that a community has determined to be 'uncompromisable'.

That is why, in this world, Baphomet's own definition is 'non-existent'.
Consequently, she can accept any kind of 'Faith'.

Because she is not limited by the framework of this world,
her sense of self can expand itself endlessly, boundlessly.

Thus, those who worshipped Baphomet would all
lose their sense of self, and eventually lose their sanity.

While walking from 60th Street through South Ikebukuro Park,
Baphomet recalls the recent incident.

I'm quite unsure of both 60階通り and 南池袋公園,
so maybe you can help me with it

The color gangs of underground Ikebukuro.
And, the different conclusion they reached this time.

name: Baphomet
text:
To be enshrined, to be carried...
'I' have lived only as others demanded.

name: Baphomet
text:
For the first time here in this Tokyo...
I might have finally been able to determine again,
what it is that I truly wanted to do.

name: Baphomet
text:
I must properly thank the person...
Who has given me that opportunity.

In the midst of the grand finale following the clash with the police,
Baphomet softly called out to [Player].

name: Baphomet
text:
Thank you for everything during the festival.
To a heretic like you, I offer my special thanks and my affection.

name: Baphomet
text:
This is not exactly meant to be my gratitude, but...
If you would like, would you join me in the hot springs at the end of the festival?

name: Baphomet
text:
To celebrate our victory, the owner has reserved the springs for us.
It will be after the children have finished, but you should be able to relax.

name: Baphomet
text:
I shall leave it up to you on whether to come, but I will give you the key.
You can return it another day.

note: I'm speechless too don't look at me

options.text: Relaxing in a private hot spring sounds amazing.
B-Baphomet's leftover bathwater...!?
Wait, she didn't say I had to go 'alone', right?

text:
Unlocking the sliding door of the bathhouse with the 'Reserved' sign,
[Player] enters the area of the otherworldly hot springs.

Soft lighting dimly illuminates the surroundings.
The owner is absent, and no voices can be heard, truly a private open-air bath.

options.text: (Head toward the foot bath)
(Head toward the open-air bath)
(Proceed, checking if anyone is already there)

name: Baphomet
text:
...Oh, you arrived sooner than I expected?
Welcome, my little dear Summoner.

options.text: Ah—!! I knew you'd be here!!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My, how energetic you are.
But no matter how loud you shout, no one will hear you, no?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
There is no one here but us.
No one is watching, so there is no need to worry.

options.text: Y-You're huge...!? No, that's not what I mean!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My, how energetic you are.
But no matter how loud you shout, no one will hear you, no?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
There is no one here but us.
No one is watching, so there is no need to worry.

options.text: I-Is it okay for me to come in like this...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fufu... You are quite quick to catch on.
I thought you would be more flustered.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, it is quite alright.
'I' intended for this from the start.

name: Baphomet
text:
The children have already finished their bath and are on their free time.
Fufu... They were considerate enough to let me rest in peace.

name: Baphomet
text:
Now, would you come sit by my side?
You have worked very hard as well, so you need time to rest.

options.text: Are the kids alright now?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I decided to reduce the time I spend watching over them slightly.
They must learn how to live on their own terms, after all.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Little by little—
They need to leave my hands and become able to live for themselves, don't you think?

options.text: You worked hard too, Baphomet.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It is only because you have assisted me.
I would not have been able to rest this peacefully on my own.

options.text: P-Please, excuse me...!

text:
Soaking their bodies in the water side-by-side,
Baphomet peered into [Player]'s face.

name: Baphomet
text:
I was waiting because I believed you would come.
You have been such a great help to me,
so I wanted to express my gratitude.

name: Baphomet
text:
You protected and believed in the children,
and alongside him who stood up to the police, you have guided us.

name: Baphomet
text:
If it had been a strict officer, it would not have been
strange for them to be taken away from the very start.

name: Baphomet
text:
So, thank you very much.
For those who could have come― I am truly glad that it was you two.

Eyes like red moons narrowed slightly.
Beneath that glossy black fur, she must surely be flushed from the heat.

name: Baphomet
text:
Furthermore, through this incident, I have even been
able to find what I want to do and what I ought to do.

Soaked in the hot spring, Baphomet's four-fingered hand,
with its joints visible, gently grasped [Player]'s hand.

name: Baphomet
text:
And so, I would like to offer a reward. Something,
that might be considered 'improper' in front of the children—

name: Baphomet
text:
It is a shameless and embarrassing reward, but...
Will you accept it?

options.text: I-I didn't do it for a reward...
What kind of reward could it be...? *gulp*!
(Swallows hard)

name: Baphomet
text:
Fufu... ufufufu!
Festivals in this Tokyo are truly amazing!

name: Baphomet
text:
The only festivals I knew were 'Night Banquets'.
I was curious, but Tokyo festivals were quite unfamiliar to me.

options.text: You sure eat a lot, Baphomet?
Why don't you try this, and this too?
I'm not gonna lose to you!

name: Baphomet
text:
Oh, how embarrassing...
It seems I am quite the glutton.

name: Baphomet
text:
Since I may eat anything without limit...
Please, I beg you, do not stare too much.

name: Baphomet
text:
But it is fun, once you have gotten yourself into it. Here, you too.
You did not have any time to play during the festival, did you?

name: Baphomet
text:
Besides, I wanted to be an adult in front of the children.
I rarely had the chance to truly let loose.

name: Baphomet
text:
Now then, [Player]-'kun'. What shall we do next?
Or would you like something to eat?

name: Baphomet
text:
Please do not worry about the money.
I do have a job, so I have more economic power than you.

Wandering around the various stalls, Baphomet would cry out
with pure delight at every single thing.

Stuffing her cheeks with franks, being surprised by the stickiness of cotton candy,
laughing excitedly at the shooting gallery and goldfish scooping...

Perhaps as a reaction to acting as the calm adult for the children,
Baphomet was enjoying the winter festival with her entire being.

options.text: So this is what the 'reward' was...
She's more excited than I've ever seen her...!
Baphomet-san, let's do that next, that one!

name: Baphomet
text:
[Player]-kun, let's go to that stall next.
Let's play until the festival is completely over!

The winter festival drew towards its end.
The crowds at the stalls thinned, allowing the two to enjoy everything without waiting.

After visiting almost every stall,
they decided to take a break on the outskirts of the venue.

A plaza where the floats stood still after their performance.
Brushing off the light dusting of snow, the two sat side-by-side on a bench.

An open spot on the mountain, like a small hill.
Baphomet gazed up at the night sky stretching across the horizon.

name: Baphomet
text:
I intended this as a reward, but... I was the one who got carried away.
How long has it been since I have enjoyed myself this much, free from all ties?

Holding the bag with the caught goldfish up to the moonlight,
Baphomet smiled with a flushed face.

name: Baphomet
text:
I must take good care of this little one.
It is a life that can no longer survive without my care, after all.

name: Baphomet
text:
A fragile existence that cannot live without protection.
But that is exactly why... I feel a sense of empathy.

name: Baphomet
text:
Unable to survive without the meal provided.
I have found myself feeling quite fond of this little one.

Red eyes turned toward the decorated floats.
There stood the statue that had been carried aloft just moments ago.

name: Baphomet
text:
You see... I had a dream.
A shameless, embarrassing dream.

options.text: Embarrassing... What kind of dream is it?
It's wonderful to still have dreams even as an adult.
I feel like most dreams are a bit embarrassing...

name: Baphomet
text:
I plead you, please do not laugh.
To putting one's own feelings into words is a bashful thing.

Baphomet said, and then paused.
She lowered the bag of goldfish and fell silent for a moment.

Finding the words, and then speaking them.
To speak of one's own wishes is to bear those two types of shame.

The words might not be correct.
They might not be conveyed well.

As a school counselor, Baphomet knows
that embarrassment and shamelessness very well.

And, she also knows the importance
of speaking out despite that fear—

name: Baphomet
text:
I wanted to be... carried by someone I liked.
I wanted to be carried aloft, to tour the festival.

name: Baphomet
text:
Whenever I was carried, I was always the center of the festival.
I wanted to enjoy the festival from that perspective for once.

name: Baphomet
text:
Fufu, even though I am this large and heavy.
It is shameless, is it not?

options.text: S-Should we give it a try...!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fufu, no matter how confident you are, you would surely be crushed by me.
If you were to carry me, it would have to be like this...

options.text: I'm quite confident in my strength, if you'll allow me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fufu, no matter how confident you are, you would surely be crushed by me.
If you were to carry me, it would have to be like this...

options.text: Becoming smaller than you are now... Would that be difficult?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I do wonder.
I... was desired to be great and beautiful, and so I was carried aloft.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That is something to be proud of in its own right.
But... What about you?
What would you wish for me?

text:
Baphomet holds out her four-fingered hand,
ending in roundly polished black 'hooves', to [Player].

options.text: (Scoop up her hand, supporting it)
(Take her hand for a handshake)
(Let her take your hand as you hesitate)

name: Baphomet
text:
What a lovely palm.
No matter what shape it takes, to me it is fragile...

name: Baphomet
text:
It should be small and unreliable, yet it feels powerful somehow.
You have held a sword with this hand, have you not?

Baphomet entwines her fingers,
looking down with a somewhat ecstatic gaze.

name: Baphomet
text:
When winter ends, spring will come. You are a third-year...
Have you already thought about your career path?

options.text: Not at all yet...
I'm thinking about it, but I can't quite imagine it.
I think attending the Police Academy would be good, but...

name: Baphomet
text:
It is difficult, is it not?
Supporting your own future with such small hands...

name: Baphomet
text:
Furthermore, you seem to be free from various shackles.
As if you are living just as you flow...

options.text: What are you going to do, Baphomet-san?
Will we meet again even after the festival ends?
(Be silenced by your pounding heart)

name: Baphomet
text:
In truth, I have already decided.
I shall return to the academy and be a school counselor once more.

name: Baphomet
text:
I will go to Shinjuku Academy if they so request a dispatch.
When that happens, I would love for you to tell me your story.

name: Baphomet
text:
But, I cannot go back to working at the academy exactly as before.
Because, you have changed me.

name: Baphomet
text:
I will likely face the students with a
different approach, using unconventional methods.

name: Baphomet
text:
Just like what you all showed me at this festival,
I have found myself wanting to try such things.

Then, Baphomet's grip on [Player]'s hand tightens.
Her entwined fingers capture their palm.

name: Baphomet
text:
[Player]-kun, I wonder?
Are you interested in a university for psychology?

name: Baphomet
text:
I truly believe you are suited to being a counselor.
If you would like, I could even help you with your studies starting now?

At her words, and before [Player] could open their mouth,
Baphomet smiled somewhat apologetically.

name: Baphomet
text:
—Oh, I am sorry.
You must have things you want to do.

options.text: I want to decide my own path.
I can't even think about a career path yet.
I-If it's with you, Baphomet-san...!

name: Baphomet
text:
You are being scouted by the Police Academy, aren't you?
And then, you are also troubled over whether to stay at Shinjuku Academy...

name: Baphomet
text:
Fufu, you see, I am shamelessly tempting a
young person who is lost in their 'career' path.

name: Baphomet
text:
Since I am a heretic, I want to give you a heretical 'option'
that isn't bound by the paths currently before you.

Suddenly, Baphomet releases [Player]'s hand.
The soft, warm fur pulls away, and the cold wind strokes their skin.

name: Baphomet
text:
I wonder if you are interested in me.
But— That might just be my 'ability'.

name: Baphomet
text:
Your feelings, and what it is that you think of me.
What would you do if all of that were just a lie for the sake of temptation?

options.text: Baphomet, you're charming, but...
You wouldn't tell a lie like that.
There's no way it was a lie after how much fun you were having.

name: Baphomet
text:
Fufu... You truly believe me?
You really are... a strange and heretical person!

As if that sharp expression from before was just a passing breeze,
Baphomet bursts out with that brilliant smile.

name: Baphomet
text:
I apologize for saying something so odd?
I just have a habit of doing that. Oh, how funny!

name: Baphomet
text:
Because you are so strange, I found myself wanting to tell
you a story from long ago. It is not very long, so will you listen?

options.text: I like your stories, Baphomet-san.
Well, since you've always listened to mine...!
(Nod repeatedly as her eyes fix to yours)

name: Baphomet
text:
A long time ago, before I came to Tokyo, I lived within the 'Night Banquet'.
Amidst the 'Witch Festivals', the music, and the frenzy... You see?

name: Baphomet
text:
Everyone listened to what I said,
they worshipped me, and that was how we lived.

name: Baphomet
text:
There are happy memories too.
But... I also remember the bitter end of those who believed in me.

name: Baphomet
text:
My words were their 'faith'.
I am sure you must be free from even those kinds of shackles.

name: Baphomet
text:
...That is why I wish to know you more deeply.
So, if it is alright, will you show me your 'inner self' once more?

note: purely visual changes between Option 1/2 and Option 3

options.text: (Go to Baphomet's side)
(Snuggle up to Baphomet)
(Get lifted up onto Baphomet's lap)

name: Baphomet
text:
Then, excuse me...
I shall take a peek.

While still touching [Player],
Baphomet casts her eyes down.

Light of an mysterious color overflows from her horns, forming a circle.
The light of the 'Rule' defined as 'Zero' by the 'App'.

A mental specialist who sees through and interferes with the inner demon.
That is Baphomet's power—

name: Baphomet
text:
.......Intriguing, but.......
.......Ah, as expected, in my hands.......

Baphomet's eyes blink several times.
The light of 'Zero' surrounding her horns dissipates into the air.

name: Baphomet
text:
As I've mentioned before,
you... harbor a very complex demon.

name: Baphomet
text:
A small life harboring a complex and powerful demon
that you cannot fully hold on your own... That is yourself.

name: Baphomet
text:
How fragile, how cute...
Ah... no, this is improper...

name: Baphomet
text:
I... I 'wish to protect you'.
Even if the sky splits, even if the earth cracks,
no matter what 'crisis' stands in your way...!

The ecstatic Baphomet rapidly increases in size.
Gently grasping [Player], her body ascends toward the sky.

Tall and thick, aiming for a colossal form that truly pierces the heavens.
Recalling the greatness that was once worshipped and prayed for—

Chronicler. Record this. —Interrogated person.
You stand accused of spreading heretical teachings.

Heretic! Heretic! Heretic! Heretic! Heretic! Heretic!
Heretic! Heretic! Heretic! Heretic! Heretic! Heretic!

name: Baphomet
text:
—Ah.
Everyone has been judged again.

name: Baphomet
text:
Believing the words of a 'heretic', carrying a 'heretic' aloft, and then breaking.
No one in this world can withstand the weight of heresy.

name: Baphomet
text:
But I loved you all who tried to carry the 'heretic',
and that is why I wanted to protect you.

High above, where the winter wind blows.
There, Baphomet's gigantification stops.

Her palms formed into a bowl shape, so as not to drop [Player].
Baphomet peers down at them.

name: Baphomet
text:
...I am very sorry.
I was reminiscing about the past for a moment.

name: Baphomet
text:
Because you were so devoted... so small.
And yet you were carrying such a heavy 'demon'...

name: Baphomet
text:
I shall return you immediately. For a human body, this sky must be cold...
And the height is terrifying, is it not?

options.text: You're wonderful even when you're gigantic.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Are you not afraid?
You really are... a 'heretical' person.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...But, thank you very much.
I am truly happy to hear that.

[Player] clung to Baphomet's finger.
She strokes their head with another finger, and pressed her lips to the small life in her hand.
The soft, tendering texture on the tip of her hoofs tickled [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Still, it must be cold...
I'll guide you to a 'warm place'.
Baphomet's fingers tucked [Player] inside her 'sarashi'.

Sandwiched between the meadow-like 'twin hills', held down by cloth.
Abundant fur, a dreamlike softness, and a sweet scent.
Held within that warm elasticity, [Player] was perfectly protected from the harsh cold of the upper sky.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Are you comfortable?
Please do let me know if it becomes too difficult for you.

options.text: H-High places are a bit much...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I am sorry.
I shall return to my original size immediately, so would you hold on to me?

In about ten seconds, Baphomet returns to her original height.
Sitting side-by-side on the bench, her red eyes smile.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...You're safe now.
I might be a bit too overprotective.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text: To me, you, who are in a period of accumulating strength to live, look so precarious... and lovely.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It seems you have become more important to me than I thought.
Please, do not be crushed by my weight, no?

options.text: I love both versions of you, Baphomet!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Are you not afraid?
You really are... a 'heretical' person.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...But, thank you very much.
I am truly happy to hear that.

[Player] clung to Baphomet's finger.
She strokes their head with another finger, and pressed her lips to the small life in her hand.
The soft, tendering texture on the tip of her hoofs tickled [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Still, it must be cold...
I'll guide you to a 'warm place'.
Baphomet's fingers tucked [Player] inside her 'sarashi'.

Sandwiched between the meadow-like 'twin hills', held down by cloth.
Abundant fur, a dreamlike softness, and a sweet scent.
Held within that warm elasticity, [Player] was perfectly protected from the harsh cold of the upper sky.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Are you comfortable?
Please do let me know if it becomes too difficult for you.

text:
In the distance, the bustle grows quiet.
The end of the festival is approaching.

Having finished their play at the festival, people are heading home.
With the lively clamor, brilliant floats, and happy memories in their hearts.

name: Baphomet
text:
Everyone is returning from the festival...
Having a place to return to is a wonderful thing.

name: Baphomet
text:
I wonder if those people who returned from
the 'Night Banquet' also walked like this once.

name: Baphomet
text:
I wonder if those children can also return
to where they should be, just like this?

options.text: You must have become the place those children return to.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The place I made is nothing more than a 'temporary dwelling'.
A resting place, until they find the place where they truly live.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text: But... Even if it is only for a moment, if I could be a place where they can sleep through the night, I am happy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Everyone makes memories in a 'temporary dwelling' and lives their life ahead—
And you are likely no exception.

options.text: You've become a 'found family', haven't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The place I made is nothing more than a 'temporary dwelling'.
A resting place, until they find the place where they truly live.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text: But... Even if it is only for a moment, if I could be a place where they can sleep through the night, I am happy.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Everyone makes memories in a 'temporary dwelling' and lives their life ahead—
And you are likely no exception.

options.text: Where are you returning to, Baphomet-san?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text: Oh... Fufu, I wonder if you are concerned about me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text: Or, do you intend to perversely tempt a heretic like me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you are going to step into heresy, you must be more daring...
For example, like this.

name: Baphomet
text:
...Listen, [Player]-kun.
When you graduate from high school, won't you come to my place?

name: Baphomet
text:
You can live with me, as you attend an university.
And, how about we work as counselors together?

name: Baphomet
text:
I can protect you from anything.
No matter what. No matter the cause.

options.text: Then who will protect you, Baphomet-san?
I can protect myself.
If it's with you, Baphomet-san... That might be nice...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What a lovely thing to say.
...It would be best if you refrain from saying that to anyone else, yes?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I know, because I have seen your 'inner self'.
No matter who clings to you, you will go wherever you wish.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That way of being is so dazzling to me...
Because I could only live by being carried aloft by someone else.

text:
Baphomet casts her eyes down.
Her 'captivating' eyes are bleeding red.

name: Baphomet
text:
Protection is not enough, is it?
You all would have thoughts on wanting to walk on your own two feet.

name: Baphomet
text:
It is all so touching, so sad, and... so dearing.
You all likely cannot live any other way.

A hand with glossy, alluring black fur
slowly stroked [Player]'s head.

The sounds of a somewhat nostalgic festival melody can be heard.
No one knows if it belongs to humans or the otherworld.

options.text: (Entrust your body to Baphomet)
(Listen to Baphomet's whispers)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Since we are here, shall we move elsewhere too?
We have played a lot at the festival, so let us go somewhere we can relax.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
There is no need to walk.
Just keep breathing slowly...
Yes, just close your eyes...

options.text: I want to go somewhere where we can be alone.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fufu... I was thinking the exact same thing.
We might be quite compatible, you and I.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Then I shall take you where you desire.
Just keep breathing slowly...
Yes, just close your eyes...

text:
[Player]'s eyelids grow heavy from the familiar warmth and pleasant fatigue.
Before they know it, they begin falling asleep—

A melody can be heard through the slumber.
A soft sequence of notes, different from Tokyo's festival music.

Guided by that leisurely melody,
[Player] slowly opens their eyes.

name: Baphomet
text:
...Oh, you have woken up.
Good morning. Though, it is only still night.

[Player] is lying on a bed
provided in the room.

Their head is resting not on a pillow, but on Baphomet's rich 'thighs'.
They are positioned on lap-pillow, peered down at from above.

A 'fingertip' brushes the hair from their forehead.
The background looks like an infirmary they've never seen before—

options.text: This place...? A hospital... An infirmary?
Is this what they call 'taking someone home'!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Do you desire a 'feast' for just the two of us?
I wonder 'which side' you would prefer.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Just kidding. Please come back for a 'feast' after you graduate.
Even if I am a heretic, I do work at a academy—
I am an educator, after all?

options.text: (Enjoy the Baphomet's lap pillow)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Do you desire a 'feast' for just the two of us?
I wonder 'which side' you would prefer.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Just kidding. Please come back for a 'feast' after you graduate.
Even if I am a heretic, I do work at a academy—
I am an educator, after all?

name: Baphomet
text:
This is my counseling room.
I have brought you here, as I could not bear to wake you.

name: Baphomet
text:
Dozing off right in front of me. I am half happy and half worried.
You would not have been able to complain no matter what happened, no?

Baphomet lets her gaze wander around the
area to show [Player], who has opened their eyes.

A clean, calm interior resembling an infirmary.
In one corner is an aquarium where the goldfish caught earlier is swimming.

name: Baphomet
text:
I am currently on leave to focus on the children of underground Ikebukuro...
But I shall return in the spring, so I still have the key.

name: Baphomet
text:
...I wanted you to see it.
The kind of place in Tokyo where I work.

name: Baphomet
text:
...I wonder what kind of adult
you will eventually become.

Baphomet said happily,
celebrating her own self.

name: Baphomet
text:
What kind of job will you have,
and what kind of person you will be with—
Or if you will be alone, what kind of life will you live?

name: Baphomet
text:
If, within those countless choices, there was a future
with a counselor, that would surely be... wonderful.

Baphomet peers at [Player] and smiles.
The alluring black fur closes the distance.

options.text: (Let her hand cup your cheeks)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I could only wonder, what version of me is reflected in your eyes...
Fufu.

options.text: (Lift Baphomet up)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, my... Are you alright, not crushed?
But... This makes me just as happy as a child.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I would like to do the same for you... Aah.
Surely that is what this world is all about.

options.text: (Be kissed by her)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
This is the temptation of one who tries to pull another into their own path.
Is it not improper for a Christmas present to be a heretical future?

name: Baphomet
text:
I want to be by your side, to see what kind of adult you become.
If I do... I feel like I shall find the answer I have been seeking.

name: Baphomet
text:
Starting from the spring, you are welcome to come here anytime.
And I would be happy if you could show me that 'inner self' again.

Neither human, nor beast.
Neither man, nor woman.

Therefore, Baphomet is torn on the boundary of binary oppositions,
and can only find herself through the 'inner self' of others.

A shameless demon who belongs nowhere, wandering the gap of the boundaries.
That is Baphomet.

And yet, or perhaps because of that...
With a captivating, bright, and mysterious smile, Baphomet says:

name: Baphomet
text:
No matter how embarrassing it is, I have finally decided
to truly try the thing I have found I want to do.

name: Baphomet
text:
You are the one who made me think that way...
Even if I do not know what I am, I now know what I want to do.

name: Baphomet
text:
And please consider a psychological profession if you feel like it.
If you do come, I shall hold an extraordinary 'study session' for you.

A heretical goat once carried aloft by someone.
A beast of 'Zero' who has lived in solitude on the boundary of antinomy.

Baphomet touched [Player] gently.
Her new place of belonging is already right here—
